Text:
It is the first time in a while that Iris and Alexia
have a day off together, so they pay a visit to
a certain much-talked-about store.

Princess Iris and Princess Alexia. Welcome to our
humble establishment.
I see you all are doing quite well for yourself.

They pass through the crowded interior and reach
a quiet corner of the store.

According to the woman with dark brown hair who leads
them there, this is a special sales floor reserved for
VIP clientele.

I initially came along to help you prepare for your
trip, but...I think I understand now. This is all very
interesting.

Isn't it? I think you should at least stay informed
about what's in fashion here in the capital.

...Trends are all fine and well, but I must remind
you to not get ahead of yourself here.

You are going to the Sacred Land as a guest for the
Goddess' Trial, after all.

Yes, I know that. But it's normal for guests to have
informal chats with the archbishop, no?

No one would suspect that an ineffectual princess
would be using it as a cover to inquire about dark
rumors of corruption or disappearing orphans.

You would arouse less suspicion than I, this is true,
but... Perhaps it was a mistake to speak to you
about the investigation....
Pardon me.

Please accept my apology for not introducing myself
sooner.

A gorgeous elf with indigo-colored hair appears
before the two sisters.
I am Luna, the proprietor of this establishment.

Luna offers Iris and Alexia some bite-sized brown
nuggets.

These are truffles, a product we've just put on the
market.
Please sample some, if it so pleases you.
Very well, I'll take you up on your offer.
I'll try just one.
Mm! This is good!
What a curious flavor.
I'll buy some. Please have them sent to my dormitory.
Thank you for your patronage.

If you have any other new items you think are worth
our attention, I'd be happy to see them.
As you wish.
Alexia, we came here to prepare for your trip.
Yes, I understand that.
Will you be traveling?
To the Sacred Land.

My, my... In that case, I shall see if I can find a
few things that might be of use.
Please do.
Oh, and this doesn't have anything do with my trip...

but can you show me two or three outfits that you'd
recommend?
Haven't you already ordered several party dresses?

That isn't what I meant... I'm looking for something
more, I don't know, casual. Like for everyday use.
As a gift for a friend?

A gift... No, not quite, but it's also not really for
me so much asâ€•well...
Hehe.
Well then, perhaps this might be to your liking.

Luna motions to the shop staff who brings over a
product.
Th-Th-Th-This...Th-This is...!
They're women's underwear. We call them Thongs.
Th...Thongs?
Iris is shocked.

While it does indeed bear some resemblance to women's
underwear, the amount of cloth is entirely too scarce.

It leaves the butt almost entirely exposed, and to
make matters worse, are transparent in places.

It only covers the absolute bare minimum. The design
is cute, but it is much too blunt in its intent.
(I-I'm not so sure underwear like this should exist!)

Um, pardon me! The cloth covers way too little,
and furthermore, it's see-through in places!
Perhaps men would find them most fetching.
Men?!
Alexia! You can't be...!
Iris...
What?!
I am confident about the shape of my butt!
(What in the world is my sister saying?!)
That is not the issue here!

S-S-Such immodest undergarments are not appropriate
for a princess!
Also, let go of those!
Iris. I'm confident in the shape of my...
I heard you the first time! But no, I won't allow it!
You may also try it on, if you wish.
What?!
(Stop making things worse!)
Please!
Whaaat?!

Absolutely not! I know you'll just try to sneak your
way into buying them!
Tsk.

Princess Iris? Perhaps you are misunderstanding.
Thongs are undergarments meant to be worn by
women.
Well, that isn't what you said just a moment ago!

The truth is...I have on a pair myself! Please take a
look!

As you can see, it leaves no lines even with this
thin dress...

That's incredible. You really should see for
yourself.
No, I can do without!
I'm heading to the dressing room!
Alexia?! Not so fast, Alexia!

Ah, wait, at least take off your shoes and fold your
clothes...
It feels nice to the touch. As for the fit...
Ahhhh! Alexia! Isn't that transparent?!
It's fine...barely.

It's just barely nothing of the sort! Any way you
look at it, you're st-st-sticking out...

At any rate, no! A hundred times, no! I will not
accept it!
Are you sure?
Yes, very sure!

As a princess of Midgar, I refuse to accept such
shameless underwear!
But Iris...!
I absolutely refuse!
I see... But Iris.
*astonished gasp*
Alex...ia...

You know, I want to listen to you. Iâ€™ve always been
swayed by meaningless words and lost sight of what
matters.
Like the time you told me you liked my swordplay.

My swordplay is a symbol of my small, insignificant
life. Thatâ€™s why I want to listen to those who accept
that about me.
Alexia...

Iris is moved to the point of trembling. After so
very long, they were finally seeing eye to eye
as sisters.

If you canâ€™t accept Thongs, I wonâ€™t buy them. But
I would really like to try wearing them.

But no. Despite how much I would like to wear a
Thong, I'll abandon the idea.
So please answer me.

Are you absolutely sure Thongs are out of the
question?
Iris.
Well... I wouldn't say absolutely...
Then I'm buying one.

Actually, I want several, with different patterns.
And that one with the holes! May I try it on?
Um...
Oh, why not...
